name: Zootopia+
summary: The adventures of the creatures of the most incredible metropolis: Zootopia.
info:
• 中文名: 疯狂动物城+
  • 话数: 6
  • 放送开始: 2022年11月9日
  • 放送星期: 星期三
  • 动画制作: Walt Disney Animation Studios
  • 别名: 疯狂动物城大小事
  • 别名: 動物方城市+
  • 别名: 優獸大都會+

eps.name: Hopp on Board
eps.desc: After saying goodbye to their daughter, one of Bonnie and Stu's kids sneaks aboard the Zootopia train, so they chase after it.

eps.name: The Real Rodents of Little Rodentia
eps.desc: A reality show spoof based around Fru-Fru and her sisters.

eps.name: Duke the Musical
eps.desc: After getting apprehended, Duke Weaselton ponders his life choices, through song.

eps.name: The Godfather of the Bride
eps.desc: At his daughter's wedding, Mr. Big flashes back to his humble beginnings.

eps.name: So You Think You Can Prance
eps.desc: Clawhauser attempts to audition for Gazelle's newest reality competition series.

eps.name: Dinner Rush
eps.desc: Flash and Priscilla take it slow - very slow - on their first date.
